metadata.description: Thor lead the charge as our comprehensive coverage of the fan-favorite Marvel Studios films and Marvel Television shows continues! Featuring fact sheets, movie-to-comic comparisons and production stills, this issue is packed with profiles and updates on heroes including Thor, Sif, Odin and the Warriors Three; stalwart allies including Jane Foster, Erik Selvig and Darcy Lewis; and deadly foes including the Loki and Malekith! Plus: The Aether! Frigga! Bor! Heimdall! The Collector! And more! Continue building your indispensable library of Cinematic Universe reference books with this Thor: The Dark World guidebook!
metadata.name: Guidebook to the Marvel Cinematic Universe - Marvel's Thor: The Dark World
